body: Just like many of you I've been following this series for years now. I probably started around Flowers 5 and damn it's been a Journey. You can do indeed say that this is the climax of the series after so many years. With that being said, and with the next chapter being already out. Don't you get a feeling of "this is just like life". What I mean is, it has been so long, so much wait and it will keep going for who knows how long yet we all are still here waiting for the next chapter. I dunno what is it about it. Probably just an amazing manga all around but it fills me with such a nice feeling.

This is the climax (literally) that we follower of this series have been teased for for 3-4 filler books. | There it is, the Legendary Pretzel pose, usually seen in Hetero but now the Gay. | @Nerevarine I really doubt that this is from a guy (Unless it has already been specified for i really dont cares about the real person behind the pen name) cus the lolli-gagging fillers and else. Maybe a Femboy, but a full on Heterosexual guy? Nah, that'd be a "Gekkan Shoujo Nozaki-kun" Live Action, even so that series is written by a Woman [Tsubaki (Camellia) Izumi (Never heard a guy name so, exception apply), maybe a Pen name also].
With all the shit this author has been pulling in this series, I think I have to say I hate him. But there's some fantastic parts like this one that make this series worthwhile

4.5/5 I am reviewing this as a series. As someone who is *very* familiar with the source material, this is almost spin-off level of good (a decently consistent pattern with YuruYuri doujins.) Excellent, witty dialogue and wacky situations make this a great series. The sex is pretty good too.
Damn I'm waiting for more of this and his other series too
@jazzboy i think you might right , some yuri stories needs a dick , this so lame !
Can we get a part 15 already this is already on DynastyScan for a long ass time
Wow mujeres follando asi nacen las mujeres mijos

I've been reading this series for 7 years now I wasn't even in high school and now I'm in college and this is still going on.
Godspeed goyac I wanna see Himegoto Flowers 17 when I get my degree
